A Great Place to Live
Palmetto Palms RV Resort
Condominium Association
19681 Summerlin Road, Fort Myers, Florida
LEARN MORE
CONTACT US
About Us
Welcome To Palmetto Palms RV Resort
Palmetto Palms RV Resort Condominium Association, Inc. is a resident owned senior (55+) housing community in Southwest Florida with desirable amenities and many, many daily activities. Located 3 miles from the Causeway to Sanibel Island and a 1 mile walk or bike ride to the nearest beach. You can even get to grocery stores and retail stores on your bike! Other beautiful beaches including Fort Myers Beach, several 18-hole golf courses and lots of shopping establishments are nearby.
Enjoy the sun at our two (2) swimming pools and during the winter season there are plenty of activities to choose from! There is organized play of shuffleboard, horseshoes, and volleyball. There is also tennis available at all different levels of play from beginner to inter-league play with other parks.
Our large recreation building has featured dances, shows, exercise sessions, line dancing classes, non-denominational church services, potlucks, and BINGO!
Part of our recreation building also features a game room area. We have many different card games that are offered during the season as well as smaller group activities in this area or you could also relax, read a book, do a puzzle or catch up on your email during quiet times.
Our outside Pavilion area features Happy Hours with live bands, Hot Dog Days, parties and potlucks. You never know what new activities will be added as we are a community that likes to bring others together for fun!
All 685 units are privately owned. Rentals and sales are handled by the individual owners. Our lots are comprised of RV space, park model homes and tiny homes (less than 399 sq ft). Condominium Documents, Bylaws and Rules and Regulations apply to all.
Contact Info
Palmetto Palms RV Resort Condominium Association
19681 Summerlin Road
Fort Myers, FL 33908
Phone:
(239) 466-1515
Fax: (239) 466-4166
Office Hours & Mail Pickup
MONDAY THROUGH FRIDAY
9:00 AM to 4:00 PM
***********
Mail Pickup Only: Saturdays 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM
